name: Escape and Betray
description:
This is a multi-game that can be played from at least four to at most eight players.

Human users must find key and escape from cannibals. But there's only one user who can escape. Or you can kill cannibals to win the game.

Cannibals must kill all human users and prevent human users from escaping.

There are many items on the map, and if you get them, it will make you more viable.

More information about this game is available in the in-game help.
